key_risks: Legal and regulatory challenges including labor law violations and discrimination allegations
Economic sensitivity and vulnerability to market fluctuations
Dependence on a skilled talent pool for operational success
controversies: California Labor Law Violations involving failure to provide off-duty meal periods and rest breaks
Wage and Hour Violations with fines in Michigan
Discrimination Allegations including a case involving a Muslim employee
environmental_issues: Incorporating sustainability into business practices and reducing environmental impact
social_issues: Workforce reduction and restructuring affecting employees
governance_issues: Regulatory compliance and potential reputational damage from legal challenges
